TopicTitle: How to move subassembly to subcategory ?

Articles.Content: Is there a quick way to move subassembly to subassembly - subcategory ?

You can move the file manually from Windows/Mac/Linux.

If you want to do it in-game, you have to make a new subassembly from the old one and then delete the old one. There is no direct way to move.
The problem is there is no subcategory in this folder in Windows.

You'll hate it

GameData\Squad\PartList\SubassemblyCategories.cfg is what you want

this means - the category is per-game not per-save, you'll lose the category when you move save to different game folder if you don't change this, and if in the same game you have different subassembly with the same name in different saves, they'll have to share the same category, etc. etc. etc.

Edited October 4, 2015 by FancyMouse
fix whatever didn't make sense
